content: Maybe I did not understand your business model, it sounded like you were advocating sending any image that someone may post on instagram (aka an artist posting one of their latest works) to the artists in China to make copies of it. I apologize if that is not the case. It is wonderful that you are sending custom commissions, had read much of your site and did not understand that and frankly as an artist the thought of having my work replicated by a foreign artist, which has happened to a couple of my friends , and providing an easy means of doing so drove me into some sad thoughts of the future of my profession.
